locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1347\cocoasubrtf570 {\fonttbl\f0\fswiss\fcharset0 Helvetica;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\qc
\f0\b\fs48 \cf0 The DMD Compiler\
\b0\fs26 http://dlang.org \i\fs24 \ \pard\pardeftab720 \cf0 \ \pard\pardeftab720\qc \cf0 DMD is the reference compiler for the D programming Language. The front end of DMD is released under The GNU General Public License.\ \ D is a systems programming language. Its focus is on combining the power and high performance of C and C++ with the programmer productivity of modern languages like Ruby and Python. Special attention is given to the needs of quality assurance, documentation, management, portability and reliability.\ \ The D language is statically typed and compiles directly to machine code. It's multiparadigm, supporting many programming styles: imperative, object oriented, and metaprogramming. It's a member of the C syntax family, and its appearance is very similar to that of C++.\ \ \pard\pardeftab720\qc
\i0 \cf0 The compiler is installed under /Library/D/dmd/ and symbolic links are created to /usr/local. \i \
\i0 \ DMD by Digital Mars, see \fs26 http://www.digitalmars.com/ \fs24 \ Mac OS X DMD package by Jacob Carlborg <doob@me.com>\ \
\b This package is intended for Mac OS X Mavericks (10.9) and later.}

requirement.message: This package can only be installed on Mac OS X Maavericks (10.9) or later.
At least 22MB of disk space has to be avaliable to install this package.
